languages.text: "Бездельники они, вот кто. Кого ни возьми. Да того же Янриса Данрока, к примеру, крыса благородная. Перед офицерством лебезит, а сам в такие дела влезает — впору сжечь живьем. Еще и других подписывает на грязные дела. Один из младших кормчих моих для него с Футфола таскал какой-то товар, потом на этом деле сенешалю попался и кончил в пустотном люке. А этому Данроку хоть бы хны!"

"Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"
languages.original_text: "Бездельники они, вот кто. Кого ни возьми. Да того же Янриса Данрока, к примеру, крыса благородная. Перед офицерством лебезит, а сам в такие дела влезает — впору сжечь живьем. Еще и других подписывает на грязные дела. Один из младших кормчих моих для него с Футфола таскал какой-то товар, потом на этом деле сенешалю попался и кончил в пустотном люке. А этому Данроку хоть бы хны!"

traits.locale_text: "Rapscallions, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He's fawning on the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned at the stake. He's signing up others to take a fall for him, too. One of my Junior Helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

"Rapscallions, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He's fawning on the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned at the stake. He's signing up others to take a fall for him, too. One of my Junior Helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

He's signing up others to take a fall for him, too. One of my Junior Helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

"Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

languages.text: “他们全都是屁用没有的废物，没错，我就是这个意思。就拿詹里斯·丹罗克来说吧，那只高高在上的黄鼠狼一直在拍那群官员的马屁，可他干的那些破事，都足够让他上火刑架了。所以，他就把别人也拉进他的圈子里，这样就可以找别人替他背锅了。我有个初级舵手替他从落脚港运货，结果被总领发现了。那个人被丢出了气闸，可丹罗克连个屁都没放！”
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: “他们全都是屁用没有的废物，没错，我就是这个意思。就拿詹里斯·丹罗克来说吧，那只高高在上的黄鼠狼一直在拍那群官员的马屁，可他干的那些破事，都足够让他上火刑架了。所以，他就把别人也拉进他的圈子里，这样就可以找别人替他背锅了。我有个初级舵手替他从落脚港运货，结果被总领发现了。那个人被丢出了气闸，可丹罗克连个屁都没放！”

languages.text: «Son unos inútiles que solo saben perder el tiempo. Todos y cada uno. Empecemos por esa comadreja de Janris Danrok. Con los oficiales es un adulador, pero algunos de los tratos que organiza bastarían para condenarlo a la hoguera. Y además arrastra a otros a sus planes para que se lleven la culpa. Uno de mis timoneles novatos estaba trasladando unos productos desde Paso cuando le sorprendió el Senescal y acabó al otro lado de la esclusa. ¡Y a Danrok le importó un pimiento!».
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: «Son unos inútiles que solo saben perder el tiempo. Todos y cada uno. Empecemos por esa comadreja de Janris Danrok. Con los oficiales es un adulador, pero algunos de los tratos que organiza bastarían para condenarlo a la hoguera. Y además arrastra a otros a sus planes para que se lleven la culpa. Uno de mis timoneles novatos estaba trasladando unos productos desde Paso cuando le sorprendió el Senescal y acabó al otro lado de la esclusa. ¡Y a Danrok le importó un pimiento!».

languages.text: 「能なしの役立たずども、その一言に尽きるでしょう。みんなそうなのですよ。ジャンリス・ダンロックを例に取れば、生まれが高貴だけでなずる賢いヤツです。あいつは将校に媚びへつらいますが、その取引の中には生きたまま火炙りに処されるようなものもあります。自分の計略に他人を巻き込んで、破滅へ向かっているようなもんですよ。私の後輩の操舵手は、フットフォールからヤツのための積み荷を運んでいましたが、家令長に捕まり、ヴォイドハッチに叩き込まれたのですよ。ダンロックは気にもとめていませんがね！」
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: 「ろくでなしの浪費家、それがあいつらでしょう。それぞれがそうなのですよ。ジャンリス・ダンロックを例に取れば、あいつは生まればかり高貴なずる賢いヤツです。あいつは将校に媚びへつらいますが、その取引の中には火炙りに処されるようなものもあります。自分の計略に他人を巻き込んで、破滅へ向かっているようなもんですよ。私の後輩の操舵手は、フットフォールからヤツのための積み荷を運んでいましたが、家令長に捕まり、ヴォイドハッチに叩き込まれたのですよ。ダンロックは気にもとめていませんがね！」

languages.text: "Das sind durch die Bank verdammte Nichtsnutze. Jeder Einzelne von ihnen. Janris Danrok zum Beispiel, dieses hochgeborene Wiesel. Er scharwenzelt um die Offiziere herum, aber für einige seiner Geschäfte würde er bei lebendigem Leibe verbrannt werden. Außerdem zieht er andere Leute in seine Geschäft rein, damit sie für ihn den Kopf hinhalten. Einer meiner Steuermänner hat Waren aus Footfall für ihn transportiert, bis er vom Truchsess erwischt und in die Leerenluke gesteckt wurde. Danrok war das total egal!"
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: "Das sind durch die Bank verdammte Nichtsnutze. Jeder Einzelne von ihnen. Janris Danrok zum Beispiel, dieses hochgeborene Wiesel. Er scharwenzelt um die Offiziere herum, aber für einige seiner Geschäfte würde er auf dem Scheiterhaufen landen. Außerdem zieht er andere Leute in seine Geschäft rein, damit sie für ihn den Kopf hinhalten. Einer meiner Steuermänner hat Waren aus Footfall für ihn transportiert, bis er vom Truchsess erwischt und in die Leerenluke gesteckt wurde. Danrok war das total egal!"

languages.text: « Des bons à rien, voilà ce que j'en pense. Tous autant qu'ils sont. Prenez ce nobliau véreux de Janris Danrok. Il caresse les officiers dans le sens du poil, mais certaines de ses petites affaires devraient lui valoir le bûcher. Sans parler des idiots qu'il implique dans ses magouilles afin de leur faire porter le chapeau à sa place. L'un de mes timoniers en second qui transportait des marchandises pour son compte depuis Castel s'est fait prendre par le sénéchal qui l'a balancé dans le vide. Eh bien, Danrok n'a pas levé le petit doigt pour lui ! »
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: « Des bons à rien, voilà ce que j'en pense. Tous autant qu'ils sont. Prenez ce nobliau véreux de Janris Danrok. Il caresse les officiers dans le sens du poil, mais certaines de ses petites affaires devraient lui valoir le bûcher. Sans parler des idiots qu'il implique dans ses magouilles afin de leur faire porter le chapeau à sa place. L'un de mes timoniers en second qui transportait des marchandises pour son compte depuis Castel s'est fait prendre par le sénéchal qui l'a balancé dans le vide. En bien, Danrok n'a pas levé le petit doigt pour lui ! »

languages.text: "Bir halta yaramayan oksijen ziyanları. İstisnasız. Şu soylu çakal Janris Danrok mesela. Subaylara yaltaklanıp durur ama yaptığı anlaşmalardan bazıları duyulsa diri diri yakılırdı. Başkalarını da entrikalarına alet eder ki kabak başına patlamasın. Ast serdümenlerimden biri onun için Binliman'dan mal taşıyormuş. Seneşal'e yakalanınca hop, kendini uçsuzda buldu. Danrok'un umuruna olmadı tabii!"
languages.original_text: "Good-for-nothing wasters, that's what they are. Each and every one. Take Janris Danrok, that highborn weasel. He fawns over the officers, but some of the deals he makes would get him burned alive. He drags other people into his schemes so they can take the fall for him, too. One of my junior helmsmen was ferrying goods from Footfall for him, got caught by the Seneschal, and ended up in the void hatch. Danrok couldn't care less!"

traits.locale_text: "Bir halta yaramayan oksijen ziyanları. İstisnasız. Şu soylu çakal Janris Danrok mesela. Subaylara yaltaklanıp durur ama yaptığı anlaşmalardan bazıları duyulsa diri diri yakılırdı. Başkalarını da entrikalarına alet eder ki kabak başına patlamasın. Ast serdümenlerimden biri onun için Binliman'dan mal taşıyormuş. Seneşal'e yakalanınca hop, kendini uçsuzda buldu. Danrok'un umuruna olmadı tabii!"
